name: Hernandez Lopez
review: Cheap and works well. Compared with the apple home pod $99, this one is only $25! It works well too. Highly recommend

name: Rodriguez Martinez
review: The product was fine, even though it was advertised as the 2nd gen nest, I was sent a google mini with a production date of 2018 just before the nest was on the market.

name: Miller Davis
review: Love this speaker. It is beautiful, small, easy to connect and use with options on how to display it. You can rest it on something or mount it to the wall. It sounds great and is very responsive.

name: Jones Garcia
review: This is my second Google Nest Mini and I love it! One problem was delivered to the wrong address. Thank goodness my neighbors are good and honest! Otherwise, the item is great!

name: Williams Brown
review: It's not an Alexa but it's pretty close. Bluetooth with music is loud. you can play games on it, ask the weather or any question you'd ask google on your phone for that matter.

name: Smith Johnson
review: I thought I'd use it more but I don't because when I talk to it all my devices listen lol. They all go off like I'm talking to them so it's difficult to use.

name: Mary Patricia
review: Well !! It's Google Nests. So it works great with YouTube. The music output is good but great for bathroom size. Overall ok.

name: Linda Barbara
review: At less than $20, you get a smart speaker, alarm clock, News reader, weather forecast, book reader, and a lot of questions that could be answered by google. I have this even to turn off lights!

name: Elizabeth Jennifer
review: Totally love this mini. I upgraded to this generation. My mother gifted me with my first one. I remodeled my bedroom and this beautiful one blended in beautifully.

name: Maria Susan
review: It came a day earlier than it was supposed to. I love the color. I got it during the Black Friday sale online. I ended up going to the store the next day and they were sold out.
